name: Chakra Stabilizer
description: A stabilizer refined from a miracle drug prescribed by Sumizuka Pharmaceuticals for Adapter. It is free, but takes about 3 days to arrive as it has to be customized to the individual.
effect: Can only be used Out of Combat.

name: Anti-Spirit Powder
description: A powdered medicine that prevents a dead mononoke from becoming a spirit body. A corpse covered in this powder will prevent it from becoming a spirit body for about a week, providing time to collect materials like fur and leather.
effect: Can only be used Out of Combat.

name: Spiritualizing Agent
description: A powdered solution that reverts a mononoke's corpse to a spirit body, undoing the effects of Anti-Spirit Powder. It has no effect on fur and leather that has been stripped away and processed into artificial regalia.
effect: Can only be used Out of Combat.

name: Spirit Water
description: Mysterious water infused with spiritual power. It instantly heals wounds just by drinking it or sprinkling on the affected area.

name: Healing Ampule
description: A therapeutic drug exclusively for humans and magical beasts sold by Sumizuka Pharmaceutical. A needle-free syringe that repairs injuries instantly after the injection.
effect: The target Humanoid or Beast recovers 20 HP.

name: Reinforcing Silicon
description: A reinforcing silicon exclusively for cyborgs and magical creatures sold by Far East Heavy Industries. By applying to an injury, it will heal instantly.
effect: The target Mechanical or Plant recovers 20 HP.

name: Pneuma
description: A pure soul traded on the black market, resembling a liquid with a blueish-white glow encased in a glass bottle that itself is an artificial regalia.
effect: The target Undead or Mythical recovers 20 HP.

name: Odo Elixir
description: A chaotic black energy sold on the black market, resembling a liquid with a reddish-black glow encased in a glass bottle that itself is an artificial regalia.
effect: The target Insectoid or Chaos recovers 20 HP.

name: God Eye Contact
description: A disposable contact lens that can immediately distinguish the god name of another.
effect: Use on your Start Timing on one combat zone target. Make an identify or an assess check against the target to Identify it.

name: Rune Stone
description: An ore with multiple runes carved into it. By activating it at the moment the user casts a spell, it dramatically expands the range.
effect: Use it on yourself to increase the range of all Magical Attacks by 2 Sq. until the End Timing of the next round.

name: Elemental Agent
description: A magical potion that contains a specific element, created via alchemy.
effect: Select one element at the time of purchase. Use on one engaged target. For the rest of combat, the target's equipped weapon is bestowed with the chosen element.

name: Alcahest
description: An alchemic formula that can dissolve any material.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets that fail their Evasion check halve their Guard until End Timing of the current round. This effect does not stack.

name: Lime Poison
description: A deadly poison that cannot be purged and is only possible to create through refinement magic.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Magical Attack / Range: Intellect Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets that fail their Resist check halve their Ward until End Timing of the current round. This effect does not stack.

name: Soma
description: A reproduction of the spirit liquor of the gods. When drunk, it drastically improves the drinker's dynamic vision.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target gains +2 to Accuracy checks until the third End Timing after this consumable's use. You can only use this consumable once per round per character.

name: Hom
description: A drink of the gods made by mixing spiritual grass, water, and legendary fruit. When drunk, it dramatically improves the drinker's intuition.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target gains +2 to Evasion checks until the third End Timing after this consumable's use. You can only use this consumable once per round per character.

name: Kintan
description: The ultimate Taoist elixir. It increases the drinker's aptitude for magic, but an ordinary person may die or become a mononoke if they drink it.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target gains +2 to Conjure checks until the third End Timing after this consumable's use. You can only use this consumable once per round per character.

name: Pure Dragon's Blood
description: Pure dragon blood, from a true dragon instead of the dragon blood tree.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target gains +2 to Resist checks until the third End Timing after this consumable's use. You can only use this consumable once per round per character.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: A spiritual stone that transforms base metals into precious ones. It can only be created by the deepest secrets of alchemy.

name: Resurrection Elixir
description: The ultimate revival medicine passed down since the times of ancient egypt.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target is no longer downed, and they set their HP to 40. The target may refuse this effect.
